committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to expand the boundaries of Yucca House National Monument in Colorado, to authorize the acquisition of certain lands within the boundaries, and for other purposes.
short_title: Yucca House National Monument Expansion Act of 1992

summary.text: Yucca House National Monument Expansion Act of 1992 - Expands the boundaries of the Yucca House National Monument, Colorado, to include specified lands within its boundaries. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire such lands and interests in them by donation.

titles.title: Yucca House National Monument Expansion Act of 1992
A bill to expand the boundaries of Yucca House National Monument in Colorado, to authorize the acquisition of certain lands within the boundaries, and for other purposes.
